original_text:
He tends his flock like a shepherd:
    He gathers the lambs in his arms
and carries them close to his heart;
    he gently leads those that have young.
korean_text: 그는 목자 같이 양 떼를 먹이시며 어린 양을 그 팔로 모아 품에 안으시며 젖먹이는 암컷들을 온순히 인도하시리로다

sentences.original_text: He tends his flock like a shepherd
He gathers the lambs in his arms
and carries them close to his heart
he gently leads those that have young
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 새끼를 가진 양들을 부드럽게 인도하네
